name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/SKU-789012
categories: Rugs > Area Rugs > Modern Rugs
title: Alayna Abstract Gray/Blue Area Rug
description: Anchor your living room or den in contemporary style with this abstract area rug. Power-loomed in Turkey from stain- and fade-resistant polypropylene, it features a 0.5" pile height, making it an ideal choice for high-traffic areas. Its design showcases a striking abstract pattern in hues of gray, blue, and cream, adding a touch of artistic flair to your space. To keep this rug in place, we recommend using a rug pad (sold separately).

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/BDS5678Q
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Beds
title: Laurel Foundry Modern Farmhouse Anastacia Upholstered Platform Bed
description: Anchor your bedroom in a clean, contemporary style with this upholstered platform bed. Crafted with a solid and manufactured wood frame, this bed features a streamlined, low-profile headboard and footboard. The headboard is wrapped in foam-filled, polyester-blend upholstery with button-tufted details for a touch of texture. A series of slats and center support legs accommodate your preferred mattress (not included) without the need for a bulky box spring. Assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-RG8801
categories: Rugs > Area Rugs > Modern Rugs
title: Joss & Main Lilia Abstract Performance Rug - Gray/Beige
description: Anchor your living room or bedroom in contemporary style with the Lilia Abstract Performance Rug. Featuring a subtle abstract pattern in neutral gray and beige tones, this rug effortlessly complements a variety of decor schemes. Machine-woven in Turkey from durable, stain-resistant polypropylene, it's designed to withstand high-traffic areas and is easy to clean, making it a perfect choice for homes with pets or children. The low 0.33-inch pile height provides a soft underfoot feel without obstructing doorways.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/SKU789012
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Adalyn 84'' Velvet Square Arm Sofa with Reversible Cushions
description: Anchor your living room in sophisticated style with this glamorous sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this sofa features a full back, square arms, and four tapered dowel legs in a light, natural finish. Enveloped in plush velvet upholstery, this sofa showcases button tufting and detail stitching for a tailored touch, while its sinuous springs and foam-filled cushions provide comfortable support. The reversible cushions make for easy cleaning and maintenance.

text: Spot clean with a dry, solvent-based cleaner

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFRG8492
categories: Rugs > Area Rugs > Modern Rugs
title: Azure Abstract Waves Machine-Washable Area Rug
description: Infuse your space with contemporary flair using the Azure Abstract Waves Area Rug. This stunning piece features a captivating abstract pattern in shades of azure blue, ivory, and slate gray, bringing a touch of modern artistry to any room. Crafted for modern living, this rug is not only stylish but also incredibly practical. Its machine-washable design makes cleaning a breeze, while the non-slip backing ensures it stays securely in place. Perfect for high-traffic areas, living rooms, or bedrooms, this pet-friendly and durable rug combines elegance with everyday functionality.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-BD1101
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Beds
title: Andover Mills™ Altamira Upholstered Platform Bed
description: Create a sophisticated and restful retreat in your bedroom with the Altamira Upholstered Platform Bed. This bed features a classic button-tufted headboard wrapped in a soft, durable polyester blend fabric. The sturdy wooden frame and slat system provide excellent support for your mattress without the need for a box spring. With its clean lines and versatile design, this platform bed effortlessly complements both traditional and contemporary decor styles. Assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/SCSFV84CG
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Anya Performance Velvet 84'' Upholstered Sofa with Reversible Cushions
description: Anchor your living room in modern, approachable style with this streamlined sofa. Founded on a solid and engineered wood frame, this sofa features a full back, track arms, and four tapered dowel legs in a natural finish. Enveloped in plush performance velvet upholstery, this sofa showcases deep button tufting and detail stitching for a tailored touch, while its sinuous spring suspension and foam-filled cushions provide comfortable support. The cushions are removable and reversible for easy cleaning.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFDRS1088
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Dressers & Chests
title: Amina 6-Drawer Double Dresser with Gold Accents
description: Crafted from a blend of solid and engineered wood, this 6-drawer double dresser brings a touch of mid-century modern flair to your bedroom. Its clean-lined silhouette is founded atop splayed legs and features a neutral finish that blends with any color palette. The six drawers provide ample storage for your clothes and linens, operating on smooth metal glides. Gold-finished hardware adds a glam touch to the design. Assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF8870-S
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Everly Quinn 84'' Upholstered Sofa with Reversible Cushions
description: Anchor your living room in sophisticated style with this modern tuxedo-arm sofa. Crafted with a solid wood frame, it's upholstered in a plush, stain-resistant velvet for a touch of luxury. The foam-filled cushions are supported by sinuous springs to help resist sagging over time. This sofa features clean lines, channel tufting, and tapered metal legs for a mid-century modern look. The seat and back cushions are removable and reversible for easy cleaning and maintenance.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-CT-88301
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Coffee Tables
title: Anya Solid Wood Frame Coffee Table with Storage
description: Elevate your living space with the Anya Coffee Table. Crafted from solid pine wood with a rich walnut finish, this table combines rustic charm with modern functionality. The spacious tabletop is perfect for displaying decor, while the lower shelf offers ample storage for books, magazines, and remote controls. Its clean lines and sturdy frame make it a timeless centerpiece for any seating arrangement.

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFSOFA9876
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Joss & Main Alistair 84'' Upholstered Sofa with Reversible Cushions
description: Anchor your living room with a touch of modern farmhouse charm. This spacious 84-inch sofa is built on a solid kiln-dried hardwood frame and features plush, foam-filled cushions wrapped in a durable, family-friendly polyester blend fabric. The cushions are reversible to help maintain their shape and extend the life of the sofa. With its clean lines, square arms, and tapered wooden legs in an espresso finish, the Alistair sofa offers a timeless design that complements a variety of decor styles. Seats three comfortably.

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/DRS-KC8172
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Dressers & Chests
title: Kelly Clarkson Home Antoinette 6-Drawer Double Dresser
description: This 6-drawer double dresser brings French country style to your bedroom or guest room. It's made from solid and engineered wood with a distressed finish for a vintage-inspired look. The six drawers provide ample space for your clothes and linens, and they're set on smooth ball-bearing glides. This dresser features intricate wood-carved details, turned legs, and antique-style metal hardware. A wall anchor is included for added safety. Full assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/BDBL1031
categories: Bed & Bath > Bedding > Comforters & Sets
title: Gracie Oaks Aldora 3-Piece Reversible Comforter Set
description: Bring a touch of modern farmhouse charm to your bedroom with the Aldora 3-Piece Reversible Comforter Set. Crafted from ultra-soft, hypoallergenic microfiber, this set features a classic plaid pattern on one side and a solid neutral tone on the reverse, offering two distinct looks in one. The all-season comforter provides the perfect weight for year-round comfort. Set includes one comforter and two matching shams. Machine washable for easy care.

description: Anchor your living room in classic, rustic style with the Annabelle Coffee Table. The spacious top surface is perfect for displaying decor, while the lower shelf offers ample storage for books, magazines, and blankets. X-frame side accents add a touch of farmhouse charm. name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/CKWST10PCSS
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: EssenCore 10-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: Upgrade your kitchen with the EssenCore 10-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set. This comprehensive collection features a tri-ply construction for even heat distribution, eliminating hot spots and ensuring perfectly cooked meals every time. The set includes essential pots and pans with tempered glass lids for easy monitoring and cool-touch handles for safety and comfort. Suitable for all cooktops, including induction, and oven safe up to 500°F. The durable, non-reactive stainless steel surface is perfect for searing, browning, and frying, and cleans up beautifully, maintaining its brilliant finish for years to come.

name: projects/wayfairy-dev/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-SOFA-45892-GRN
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Foundstone Amelie 84'' Velvet Square Arm Sofa
description: Elevate your living space with the Amelie Sofa, a stunning centerpiece that blends mid-century modern design with contemporary glamour. Upholstered in luxurious, stain-resistant velvet, this sofa features a solid wood frame, plush foam-filled cushions, and elegant square arms. The tapered wooden legs add a touch of sophistication, while the included bolster pillows provide extra comfort and style. Perfect for movie nights or hosting guests, this sofa is a chic and comfortable addition to any home.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFRY-SC-98721
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Avalon 104'' Wide Velvet Reversible Modular Corner Sectional
description: Anchor your living room in sophisticated style with this glamorous sectional. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this dapper design strikes a spacious L-shaped silhouette with a full back, track arms, and tapered block feet. The sofa boasts a reversible chaise, allowing you to customize your seating arrangement. Enveloped in plush velvet upholstery, this sectional features foam and synthetic fiber-filled cushions for comfort and support, while its solid-hued color is a tasteful touch. description: Anchor your living room in rustic industrial style with this handsome coffee table. description: Anchor your living room in timeless, transitional style with the Aisling 84'' Upholstered Sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this sofa strikes a classic silhouette with a full back, track arms, and tapered block feet. name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-SLS-8842-NVY
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Perdue 81.5'' Velvet Upholstered Sofa
description: Anchor your living room in timeless, transitional style with this handsome upholstered sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this sofa features a full back, track arms, and tapered block feet in a rich espresso finish. Enveloped in rich navy velvet upholstery, this sofa features plush foam and synthetic fiber-filled cushions for comfort and support, while a pair of matching bolster pillows rounds out the design.
